Question
========

It is given that P(A) = 0.4, P(B) = 0.25 and P(A ∩ B) = 0.1. P(A ∪ B) is equal to

Answerlist
----------

* 0.45
* 0.55
* 0.65
* 0.75

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 0.45: Incorrect
* 0.55: Correct
* 0.65: Incorrect
* 0.75: Incorrect
